languages.text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.
languages.original_text: Миры-ульи поразительно густо заселены. На поверхностях планет обширные площади заняты гигантскими мегаполисами, которые пронзают небо огромными шпилями. Миры-ульи — залог благоденствия Империума. Каждый из них подобен пульсирующему сердцу экономической и военной машины. Здесь на многочисленных предприятиях производится снаряжение для армии, добываются ценные минералы и перерабатывается топливо для Имперского флота. Население именно таких миров пополняет бесчисленные ряды Астра Милитарум.

traits.locale_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial fleet. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial fleet. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

languages.text: Die Bevölkerung einer Makropolwelt ist so riesig, dass große Teile der Oberfläche der Welt häufig mit gigantischen Städten bedeckt sind, die mit hoch aufragenden Türmen geschmückt sind, welche die Atmosphäre durchdringen. Makropolwelten sind für das Wohlergehen des Imperiums lebenswichtig und bilden das schlagende Herz seiner Wirtschaft und Kriegsmaschinerie. In riesigen Manufakturen produzieren sie Munition für die Armeen des Imperators, bauen wertvolle Mineralien ab und raffinieren Treibstoff für die Imperiale Kriegsflotte. Unzählige Regimenter des Astra Militarum werden ebenfalls aus ihren riesigen Bevölkerungen gebildet.
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

traits.locale_text: Die Bevölkerung einer Makropolwelt ist so riesig, dass große Teile der Oberfläche der Welt häufig mit gigantischen Städten bedeckt sind, die mit hoch aufragenden Türmen geschmückt sind, welche die Atmosphäre durchdringen. Makropolwelten sind für das Wohlergehen des Imperiums lebenswichtig und bilden das schlagende Herz seiner Wirtschaft und Kriegsmaschinerie. In riesigen Manufakturen produzieren sie Munition für die Armeen des Imperators, bauen wertvolle Mineralien ab und raffinieren Treibstoff für die imperiale Flotte. Unzählige Regimenter des Astra Militarum werden ebenfalls aus ihren riesigen Bevölkerungen gebildet.

languages.text: La population des mondes ruches est si dense que leur surface est souvent en grande partie recouverte de gigantesques villes d'où s'élèvent d'imposantes flèches qui transpercent l'atmosphère. Les mondes ruches, essentiels au bien-être de l'Imperium, sont le moteur de son économie et de sa machine de guerre. Ils produisent des munitions pour les armées de l'Empereur, extraient des minéraux précieux et raffinent le carburant destiné à la Marine Impériale. Leur population constitue également un inépuisable réservoir de recrues pour les innombrables régiments de l'Astra Militarum.
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

traits.locale_text: La population des mondes ruches est si dense que leur surface est souvent en grande partie recouverte de gigantesques villes d'où s'élèvent d'imposantes flèches qui transpercent l'atmosphère. Les mondes ruches, essentiels au bien-être de l'Imperium, sont le moteur de son économie et de sa machine de guerre. Ils produisent des munitions pour les armées de l'Empereur, extraient des minéraux précieux et raffinent le carburant destiné à la Marine Impériale. Leur population constitue également un inépuisable réservoir de recrues pour les innombrables régiments de l'Astra Militarum.

languages.text: 巢都世界的人口密度极高，整个世界表面绝大部分区域被巨大的城市覆盖，珠光宝气的尖塔高耸入云。巢都世界对帝国的福祉至关重要，是整个帝国经济的心脏，也是这台战争机器的发动机。巢都世界的居民在庞大的制造工厂中工作，为帝皇的军队生产军需品，开采宝贵的矿藏，为帝国海军提炼燃料。规模浩大的星界军与数量繁多的军团，也都是从巢都世界数量众多的人口之中征募而来的。
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

traits.locale_text: 巢都世界的人口密度极高，整个世界表面绝大部分区域被巨大的城市覆盖，珠光宝气的尖塔高耸入云。巢都世界对帝国的福祉至关重要，是整个帝国经济的心脏，也是这台战争机器的发动机。巢都世界的居民在庞大的制造工厂中工作，为帝皇的军队生产军需品，开采宝贵的矿藏，为帝国舰队提炼燃料。规模浩大的星界军与数量繁多的军团，也都是从巢都世界数量众多的人口之中征募而来的。

languages.text: La población de un mundo colmena es tan densa que grandes partes de la superficie están cubiertas de inmensas ciudades llenas de torres colosales que atraviesan la atmósfera. Los mundos colmena son esenciales para la existencia del Imperium, al ser el corazón latiente de su economía y su maquinaria de guerra. Producen munición para los ejércitos del Emperador, extraen valiosos minerales y refinan combustible para la Armada Imperial. De sus poblaciones también surgen incontables regimientos del Astra Militarum.
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

traits.locale_text: La población de un mundo colmena es tan densa que grandes partes de la superficie están cubiertas de inmensas ciudades llenas de torres colosales que atraviesan la atmósfera. Los mundos colmena son esenciales para la existencia del Imperium, al ser el corazón latiente de su economía y su maquinaria de guerra. Producen munición para los ejércitos del Emperador, extraen valiosos minerales y refinan combustible para la Armada Imperial. De sus poblaciones también surgen incontables regimientos del Astra Militarum.

languages.text: 過密惑星の人口は非常に密集しており、その表面の大部分は大気を貫くようにそびえ立つ尖塔に彩られた、巨大な都市で覆われている。過密惑星は帝国の福祉には不可欠であり、その経済と戦争兵器の中心部である。彼らは広大な工場で皇帝の軍勢の軍需品を生産し、貴重な鉱物を採掘し、帝国海軍の燃料を精製する。帝国防衛軍の無数の連隊も、その膨大な人口により生み出されているのだ。
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.

traits.locale_text: 過密惑星の人口は非常に密集しており、その表面の大部分は大気を貫くようにそびえ立つ尖塔に彩られた、巨大な都市で覆われている。過密惑星は帝国の福祉には不可欠であり、その経済と戦争兵器の中心部である。彼らは広大な工場で皇帝の軍勢のために軍需品を生産し、貴重な鉱物を採掘し、帝国艦隊の燃料を精製している。帝国防衛軍の無数の連隊も、その膨大な人口により生み出されているのだ。

languages.text: Миры-ульи поразительно густо заселены. На поверхностях планет обширные площади заняты гигантскими мегаполисами, которые пронзают небо огромными шпилями. Миры-ульи — залог благоденствия Империума. Каждый из них подобен пульсирующему сердцу экономической и военной машины. Здесь на многочисленных предприятиях производится снаряжение для армии, добываются ценные минералы и перерабатывается топливо для Имперского флота. Население именно таких миров пополняет бесчисленные ряды Астра Милитарум.

Миры-ульи поразительно густо заселены. На поверхностях планет обширные площади заняты гигантскими мегаполисами, которые пронзают небо огромными шпилями. Миры-ульи — залог благоденствия Империума. Каждый из них подобен пульсирующему сердцу экономической и военной машины. Здесь на многочисленных предприятиях производится снаряжение для армии, добываются ценные минералы и перерабатывается топливо для Имперского Флота. Население именно таких миров пополняет бесчисленные ряды Астра Милитарум.

languages.text: Kovan dünyaların nüfusları o denli yoğundur ki çoğunda gezegen yüzeyinin büyük kısmı, atmosferi delen yüksek kulelerle bezenmiş devasa şehirlerle kaplıdır. Kovan dünyalar, İmparatorluk'un refahı için hayati önem taşırlar. Ekonomisinin ve ordularının atan kalbidirler. Devasa imalathanelerde İmparator'un orduları için mühimmat üretir, değerli madenleri çıkarır ve İmparatorluk Donanması için yakıt arıtırlar. Astra Militarum'un sayısız alayı da yine bu dünyaların devasa nüfuslarından çıkmaktadır.
languages.original_text: A hive world's population is so dense that great swathes of the surface of the world are frequently covered in gargantuan cities bejewelled with towering spires that pierce the atmosphere. Hive worlds are vital to the welfare of the Imperium and are the beating heart of its economy and war machine. They produce munitions for the Emperor's armies in vast manufactories, mine valuable minerals, and refine fuel for the Imperial Navy. Innumerable regiments of the Astra Militarum are raised from their massive populations as well.
